articles.title: The Mirage: Writing and Upheaval in the Chihuahuan Desert
articles.description: The northern Chihuahuan Desert was drowned, kneaded, jabbed, choked with ash for half a billion years of geologic tumult. Now it's being throttled for oil. The post The Mirage: Writing and Upheaval in the Chihuahuan Desert appeared first on Guernica.
